main_definition: A collection or group of items, usually related in some way, gathered together.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To travel with a group of people and their belongings
meanings_and_examples.example: We packed our bags and headed to the campsite.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A set number or quantity that is collected together in one place
meanings_and_examples.example: The store has packs of 24 batteries for sale.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To wrap items tightly and securely, often using tape
meanings_and_examples.example: She carefully packed her fragile items with bubble wrap before shipping them.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A set of related goods or products sold together as a unit
meanings_and_examples.example: The company offers various computer parts in convenient packs for customers to assemble their systems.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To prepare and organize items systematically, often for storage or transportation
meanings_and_examples.example: Before moving houses, we spent a whole day packing our belongings into boxes.
